div.p:
By clicking the Match Made battle option, we can quickly be paired
up with an opponent of equal skill. We can tailor the

setup here but, for now, let's find a 1v1 battle opponent by clicking
the Find Match button.

This pre-battle setup screen tells us more about the battle we're
about to fight. Here we can make last minute tweaks to our

army setup. When we're done, we'll click this button to inform
our opponent that we're ready to go.
